name: Like Steps in the Snow
description:
Like Steps in the Snow is a very short visual novel made with the Ren'Py Visual Novel Engine. The game tells a short and sad story about the last two robots on the Moon, Nebra and Albedo. It was made in less than 24 hours by AmazingHoffman. Thanks to NomNomNami (https://nomnomnami.itch.io) for her unbelievably cute game "her tears were my light". It inspired me greatly.
